title: Achieving Superior Oxygen Evolution of Perovskite via Phase Transition and Electrochemical Reconstruction Strategy
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04338J, Paper
Yi-Ru Hao, Hui Xue, Jing Sun, Niankun Guo, Tianshan Song, Hongliang Dong, Zhonglong Zhao, Jiangwei Zhang, Qin Wang, Limin Wu
Surface reconstruction is an effective strategy to improve the OER performance of perovskite. However, understanding the reconstruction kinetics of perovskite and revealing real active sites for OER remain elusive. Herein,...
